title: Diagram of a plant cell, 5 answer options 3

content.description: The following questions refer to the following diagram. For each phrase or sentence, select the labeled part to which it is most closely related. Each option may be used once, more than once, or not at all for each group.
content.question: Site of modification and packaging of proteins and lipids prior to export from the cell

skill.text: 2.A: Describe characteristics of visual representations of biological concepts and processes.
